channel.title: Life at MX on Join MX Player
channel.description: Recent content in Life at MX on Join MX Player

item.title: Nimish Garg
item.description: Seeing the impact of features i envisage on the users at scale, gives me joy!

item.title: Anirudha Tolambia
item.description: Attention to detail and focus on quality is what helps me do well at my job at MX. Being able to ship features to millions customers is a satisfying experience.
